content:
As an AI language model, I don't have the ability to watch movies, but I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed Soul! The movie has received widespread critical acclaim for its unique approach to themes of purpose, passion and fulfillment. The movie highlights that finding true purpose in life is not always easy, and that it's important to stay open to new experiences and to take the time to appreciate the small moments that make life worth living. 

It's a beautiful story of self-discovery and encourages viewers to reflect on what really matters to them. This message has resonated with many people, making Soul another Pixar classic that inspires meaningful conversations about life, purpose, and what it means to truly live.
